welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lagoa, Portugal! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our coastal city, known for its stunning beaches, delicious seafood, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and soak up all that Lagoa has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portimao Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Portimao Airport is reserved for VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building at Faro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mostly for low-cost airlines and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
